description:
A bright little lantern that doubles as a powerbank, what's not to like? It casts up to 314 lumens, more than enough for a card game, washing up in camp, or for civility during a power outage. The powerbank helps keep your favourite USB powered devices ready to go when you're off the grid.

  • 4 modes - 3 white light: high, 314 lumens for 5.5 hours, medium, 106 lumens for 20 hours, low 16 lumens for 96 hours, and 1 amber light mode: 23 lumens for 44 hours
  • Internal 2,600mAh battery provides a 50-75% charge to most smartphones
  • Ports: USB Type A female (output), USB Micro B female (input)
  • Charges via USB in 3.5 hours
  • Amber light is perfect for when you want to preserve your night vision
  • Integrated carabineer handle allows easy transportation and placement
  • Protective carrying bag that doubles as a light diffuser
  • IPX4 weatherproofing keeps it shining when Mother Nature turns nasty
  • Lockout mode keeps your light from turning on accidentally
  • Battery indicator light turns red when battery life has 2 hours remaining on high
  • Dimensions: 72 x 174mm
name: Nite Ize Radiant 314 Rechargeable Lantern
